attributes.action: "Stop allowing immigration to the UK because their bomabrding the NHS and Benefits system"
attributes.additional_details: Uk needs to shut its doors and concentrate on getting this recession sorted. Forgeiners are coming over to the UK and bombarding the NHS and Benefits system. Its a huge strain on our country and is now affecting people born in the UK. School places are few, diseases are being brought over, money is less, jobs are less, housing is less. It needs to stop.
